summary: The diff implements comprehensive fixes for trip creation errors with detailed logging, error handling, and actor readiness checks across TripForm.tsx, useQueries.ts, and backend/main.mo. All four requirements (REQ-14, REQ-15, REQ-16, REQ-17) appear to be fully addressed with proper form validation, mutation handling, cache invalidation, backend processing, and extensive console logging throughout the entire flow.

hallucinated_features.description: Search functionality for filtering trips in TripsPage.tsx
hallucinated_features.reason: The diff shows a search input with filtering logic for trips based on searchQuery, including empty state handling for search results. This feature was not requested in any requirement.

hallucinated_features.description: TripList component now accepts filteredTrips and searchQuery as props
hallucinated_features.reason: The TripList component has been modified to accept filteredTrips and searchQuery props to support search functionality, which was not part of the original requirements.
